title: Mastering Next.js: A Guide for Modern Web Development
excerpt: Discover how to leverage Next.js for modern web development. This guide covers setup, routing, API routes, and deployment to build scalable applications.

title: Next.js Performance Optimization: Best Practices for Faster Web Apps
excerpt: Optimize your Next.js apps with best practices like image optimization, code splitting, caching, and server-side improvements for enhanced performance.
